mapper.select: select count(*) from(select prod_num, prod_title, prod_price from product_table )prod where prod_title like'%${search_text}%' or prod_price like'%${search_text}%'

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from(select * from product_table where prod_title like'%${search_text}%' or prod_price like'%${search_text}%' order by prod_num asc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
select prod_price from product_table where prod_num = #{prod_num}
select * from product_table order by prod_num limit #{pagenum}, #{contentnum}
select * from product_table where category_num=#{categorynum} limit #{pagenum}, #{contentnum}
select count(*) from product_table where category_num = #{categorynum}
